title: Lifetime access to PDF Reader Pro for $30 ends soon
description: Macworld If you’ve ever struggled to fix a typo in a PDF or wished you could just move that image already, you’re not alone. PDF Reader Pro for Mac takes all the annoying parts of working with PDFs and makes them smooth, simple, and maybe even kind of fun. For just $29.97 (reg. $39.99), you get a lifetime license to this all-in-one PDF editor—but only through July 20. It’s fast, intuitive, and loaded with tools that help you do everything from edit text and images to redact sensitive info and add digital signatures. Need to merge or split documents? Highlight, underline, or fill out a form? Add a watermark or crop pages? This app can handle it. And it runs like a dream on Mac—opening huge files in seconds, not minutes. There’s even built-in OCR, so you can pull text from scanned documents without retyping a thing. You’ll also love the customizable reading modes and batch tools that keep you productive and organized. The license is valid for one Mac device, including updates. So if your Mac’s PDF flow could use an upgrade, don’t miss this chance to make your life easier for less. Get lifetime access to PDF Reader Pro for Mac for just $29.97 through July 20 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
